divs: sighting detailswhile sitting around a small camp fire talking and watching overhead for satellites with our neighbors we observed a soccer ball size reddish\orange light approach us from the south (about 185 degrees) at approximately 3000 feet make a u-turn and depart south (about 175 degrees). about a minute later another one followed the same path or it could have been the same one making a second circuit. each observation lasted about a minute. this sighting occurred at yellow creek lake in a rural area (no city lights) at about 1am.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Warsaw
There were no other sightings in Warsaw on or around June 20th 2010
